DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Japan. The aim of this trial is to investigate the safety and efficacy of NovoRapidÂ® (insulin aspart) as meal time insulin in subjects with type 2 diabetes treated on a basal-bolus regimen with Neutral Protamine Hagedorn (NPH) human insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Insulin Aspart in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Treated with insulin for at least 12 months and currently on a basalbolus regimen for at least 12 weeks HbA1c below or equal to 11.0% BMI (body mass index) below 30 kg/m^2
